Class Sudoku

  • java.lang.Object
    • Sudoku

  • public class Sudoku
extends java.lang.Object
    The Sudoku class runs a Sudoku GUI application, where the user can select one of many Sudoku game configurations to play.
    Author:
    Jason M ingrey1@gmail.com

      static void clearBoard(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<javax.swing.JTextField>> board) 
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Main() runs the Sudoku application by populating the boards array and passing it to a new SudokuPanel.
      static void setRandomGame(int[][][] boards, java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<javax.swing.JTextField>> board)
      setRandomGame() Populates board with a random starting game configuration from boards.

    • Method Detail

      • setRandomGame

        public static void setRandomGame(int[][][] boards,
                                 java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<javax.swing.JTextField>> board)
        setRandomGame() Populates board with a random starting game configuration from boards.
        Parameters:
        boards - all available Sudoku game board starting configurations
        board - the Sudoku board the user interacts with.

      • clearBoard

        public static void clearBoard(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<javax.swing.JTextField>> board)
        Parameters:
        board - the Sudoku board user interacts with

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Main() runs the Sudoku application by populating the boards array and passing it to a new SudokuPanel.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there are problems reading the game configuration text file or one of the UI images
